name: Tar-Nation
description:
How To Play

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
X - Fire your water gun
C - Place Dynamite

Your town has been covered in tar by an outlaw gang! It's up to you, armed with your trusty water gun and an infinite supply of dynamite, to clean up the town.

Made for the A Game By It's Cover 2020 Jam, inspired by the artwork by Alec Faulkner.
